name: MMOSessionModule
description: This component allows players to join an MMO-style game, giving them a unique 1-dimensional index in the game world.

gameFunctions.name: joinGame
gameFunctions.description: Allows a player to register in the MMO.

readFunctions.name: getPlayerCount
readFunctions.description: Gets the total number of players who have joined

readFunctions.name: getPlayerIndex
readFunctions.description: Returns a user's index in the game world.
